name: The Sword and the Sorcerer
tagline: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

name: The Crazies
tagline: About the inhabitants of a small Iowa town suddenly plagued by insanity and then death after a mysterious toxin contaminates their water supply.

name: What's Love Got to Do with It
tagline: The story of rock singer Tina Turner and how she rose to stardom with her abusive husband Ike Turner and how she gained the courage to break free.

name: Something Borrowed
tagline: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.

name: Dead Man Walking
tagline: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
tagline: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

name: Fracture
tagline: An attorney intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he's trying to prosecute.

name: Primary Colors
tagline: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for president of the USA.

name: The Karate Kid, Part III
tagline: A bad guy from KK1 attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the aid of an old army buddy.

name: Hot Shots! Part Deux
tagline: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

name: French Kiss
tagline: A woman flies to France to confront her straying fiancé, but gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

name: Brewster's Millions
tagline: A minor-league baseball player has to spend $30,000,000 in thirty days in order to inherit $300,000,000. However, he's not allowed to tell anyone about the deal.

name: Little Shop of Horrors
tagline: A nerdish florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

name: About Last Night...
tagline: A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.

name: Happy Gilmore
tagline: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

name: The Great Mouse Detective
tagline: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his arch-enemy, Professor Ratigan.

name: On Deadly Ground
tagline: Mystical martial artist/environmental agent takes on a ruthless oil corporation.

name: Surrogates
tagline: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

name: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World in 4D
tagline: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

name: Rock of Ages
tagline: A small town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip, while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

name: Running Scared
tagline: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer that nearly killed them in the past.

name: Gridiron Gang
tagline: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

name: Midnight Run
tagline: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.

name: Bachelor Party
tagline: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

name: The Terminator
tagline: A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

name: Pride & Prejudice
tagline: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

name: Last Holiday
tagline: After she's diagnosed with a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to take a European vacation.

name: Stardust
tagline: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

name: Evolution
tagline: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

name: City Heat
tagline: A slick private eye and tough police lieutenant--once partners, now bitter enemies--reluctantly team up to investigate a murder.

name: 47 Ronin
tagline: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

name: Higher Learning
tagline: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

name: Undercover Brother
tagline: When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.

name: Cruel Intentions
tagline: Kathryn makes a bet that her step-brother, Sebastian, won't be able to bed Annette (a virgin, who wants to wait until love). If he loses, Kathryn gets his Jaguar, if he wins, he gets Kathryn.

name: Scream 4
tagline: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.

name: 10 Things I Hate About You
tagline: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.

name: The Original Kings of Comedy
tagline: A concert film featuring four major African American stand up comedians.

name: The Running Man
tagline: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

name: Treasure Planet
tagline: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

name: Spaceballs
tagline: Planet Spaceball's President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal Planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

name: Ninja Assassin
tagline: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.

name: The Breakfast Club
tagline: Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

name: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
tagline: Follows the cross-country adventures of the pot-smoking duo as they try to outrun authorities who suspect them of being terrorists when they try to sneak a bong on board their flight to Amsterdam.

name: Urban Legend
tagline: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
tagline: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

name: Showtime
tagline: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based T.V. cop show.

name: 40 Days and 40 Nights
tagline: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

name: First Sunday
tagline: Durell and LeeJohn are best friends and bumbling petty criminals. When told they have one week to pay a $17,000 debt or Durell will lose his son, they come up with a desperate scheme to rob their neighborhood church. Instead, they end up spending the night in the presence of the Lord and are forced to deal with much more than they bargained for.

name: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
tagline: FBI agent Malcolm Turner and his stepson Trent go undercover at an all-girls performing arts school after Trent witnesses a murder.

name: Bed of Roses
tagline: Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist, who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.

name: The Dead Pool
tagline: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

name: Seven Years in Tibet
tagline: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

name: The Brothers Grimm
tagline: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

name: Not Another Teen Movie
tagline: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

name: Bedazzled
tagline: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted 7 wishes by the devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
tagline: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

name: It Could Happen to You
tagline: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

name: St. Elmo's Fire
tagline: A Group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood. Their main problem is that they're all self-centered and obnoxious.

name: Head of State
tagline: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman, Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.

name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
tagline: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

name: Mars Attacks!
tagline: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

name: Autumn in New York
tagline: Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.

name: August: Osage County
tagline: A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them.

name: For Colored Girls
tagline: Each of the women portray one of the characters represented in the collection of twenty poems, revealing different issues that impact women in general and women of color in particular.

name: Philomena
tagline: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

name: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
Red Riding Hood
tagline: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

name: Pan's Labyrinth
tagline: In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

name: The Nativity Story
tagline: A drama that focuses on the period in Mary and Joseph's life where they journeyed to Bethlehem for the birth of Jesus.

name: First Knight
tagline: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

name: The Fly
tagline: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

name: Good Boy!
tagline: An intergalactic dog pilot from Sirius (the dog star), visits Earth to verify the rumors that dogs have failed to take over the planet.

name: In Time
tagline: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

name: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
tagline: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

name: The Money Pit
tagline: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

name: Raising Helen
tagline: After her sister and brother-in-law die in a car accident, a young woman becomes the guardian of their three children.

name: The Back-up Plan
tagline: A romantic comedy centered on a woman who conceives twins through artificial insemination, only to meet the man of her dreams on the very same day.

name: Invictus
tagline: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as the South African President, initiates a unique venture to unite the apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

name: Jeepers Creepers
tagline: A brother and sister driving home for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature in the isolated countryside that is on the last day of its ritualistic eating spree.

name: Friday the 13th
tagline: Camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp that was the site of a child's drowning.

name: Man of the Year
tagline: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

name: Lawless
tagline: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

name: Paul
tagline: Two British comic-book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.

name: The Wild
tagline: An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.

name: Out of Sight
tagline: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a US Marshall he has kidnapped.

name: J. Edgar
tagline: J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly 50 years, looks back on his professional and personal life.

name: The Roommate
tagline: College student Sara finds that her new roommate Rebecca has an obsession with her, which quickly turns violent.

name: Jumping the Broom
tagline: Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.

name: Crossroads
tagline: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

name: The Guilt Trip
tagline: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

name: Brubaker
tagline: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

name: 30 Minutes or Less
tagline: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...
